Description:
Detects the use of various CLI utilities exfiltrating data via web requests

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Data Exfiltration Activity Via CommandLine Tools
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\cmd.exe') and (command like '%invoke-webrequest%' or command like '%iwr %' or command like '%wget %' or command like '%curl %') and (command like '% -ur%' and command like '% -me%' and command like '% -b%' and command like '% post %')) or ((process_path like '%\curl.exe' and command like '%--ur%') and (command like '% -d %' or command like '% --data %')) or (process_path like '%\wget.exe' and (command like '%--post-data%' or command like '%--post-file%'))) and ((command like '%get-content%' or command like '%getbytes%' or command like '%hostname%' or command like '%ifconfig%' or command like '%ipconfig%' or command like '%net view%' or command like '%netstat%' or command like '%nltest%' or command like '%qprocess%' or command like '%sc query%' or command like '%systeminfo%' or command like '%tasklist%' or command like '%tobase64string%' or command like '%whoami%') and (command like '%type %' and command like '% > %' and command like '% c:\%')))
